channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Royal -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Royal -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-31236|2024-07-05T17:22:28.605Z -- wp%20royal -- royal%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Royal Royal Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Royal Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.3.93.

item.title: CVE-2024-32786|2024-06-04T17:50:54.546Z -- wp%20royal -- royal%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in WP Royal Royal Elementor Addons allows Functionality Bypass.This issue affects Royal Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.3.93.

item.title: CVE-2024-32773|2024-06-04T17:50:48.510Z -- wp%20royal -- royal%20elementor%20kit
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP Royal Royal Elementor Kit.This issue affects Royal Elementor Kit: from n/a through 1.0.116.

item.title: CVE-2024-31236|2024-04-07T17:52:48.081Z -- wp%20royal -- royal%20elementor%20addons
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Royal Royal Elementor Addons allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Royal Elementor Addons: from n/a through 1.3.93.

item.title: CVE-2024-32773|2024-06-18T18:08:12.324Z -- wp%20royal -- royal%20elementor%20kit
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in WP Royal Royal Elementor Kit.This issue affects Royal Elementor Kit: from n/a through 1.0.116.
